pr_title: DB-9846 Spark 3.0 Migrate minor API changes

timeline.message: DB-9846 Spark 3.0 Migrate minor API changes
DB-9846 custom platform dependent class fix

timeline.author: martinrupp

timeline.bodyText: for other reviewers: underlying change here is that Spark2.4 uses encoder.toRow(valueRow); , while Spark3.0 uses return encoder.createSerializer().apply(valueRow); . see hbase_sql/orc-spark-3.0/src/main/java/com/splicemachine/stream/output/ParquetWriterFactoryImpl.java and 2.4
timeline.author: martinrupp
OlegMazurov

timeline.bodyText: LOG.isDebugEnabled() -- the parameter is always computed even when debug logging is disabled
timeline.author: OlegMazurov
